entry.title: Multisignature for bip-schnorr
entry.summary: The author, Nakagawa, has written a t-of-k threshold signature procedure using bip-schnorr and is requesting feedback. The code for the Threshold Signatures is available on Github at https://gist.github.com/tnakagawa/e6cec9a89f698997dc58a09db541e1eb. The original code for Multisignatures and Threshold Signatures can be found at https://github.com/sipa/bips/blob/bip-schnorr/bip-schnorr.mediawiki#Multisignatures_and_Threshold_Signatures. The author has also written a multisignature procedure using bip-schnorr, which is available at https://gist.github.com/tnakagawa/0c3bc74a9a44bd26af9b9248dfbe598b. The author is seeking feedback on both procedures and thanks in advance for any input provided.
